full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 174 of 228 850 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct with a physical exhibit? THE COURT: I'm sorry? MS. COMEY: I have a physical exhibit that I would like to approach and give to the witness. THE COURT: Please identify it for the record. MS. COMEY: Government Exhibit 52, which I will show to defense counsel before I bring it up. THE COURT: Marked for identification GX-52? MS. COMEY: Yes. Thank you, your Honor. THE COURT: Before the witness, may I see it? MS. COMEY: Yes, your Honor. THE COURT: Okay. MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. May I approach the witness? THE COURT: You may. BY MS. COMEY: Q. Mr. Alessi, I've just handed you what is marked for identification as Government Exhibit 52. Would you please take a look at that, and then tell us if you recognize it? A. Yes, I recognize it. The type of book, it was the same. Q. Hold on one second. What does this appear to be to you? A. This appear to be the direct -- these were the directories of Ms. Maxwell and Mr. Epstein. Q. Did you review this directory last night? A. Yes, I did. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018047
